last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: Kentaro goes into labor and is rushed to the hospital. Kentaro's parents and Aki wait together for the baby to be delivered.

name: He's Expecting
original_name: ヒヤマケンタロウの妊娠
overview: When a successful ad executive who's got it all figured out becomes pregnant, he's forced to confront social inequities he'd never considered before.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Kentaro Hiyama attributes his success to his ability to plan out every aspect of his life — but then, something completely unexpected happens.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Morning sickness and other bodily changes start to affect Kentaro's work. He finally meets up with Aki and tells her about his pregnancy.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: While at the hospital, Kentaro meets another cisgender pregnant man and the two become friends. The client is unimpressed with Tanabe's ideas.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The ad campaign featuring Kentaro is a huge success, making him famous. With Miyaji, he launches an online community for pregnant men.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Aki goes home for her sister's wedding and ends up butting heads with her conservative father. On her way back to Tokyo, she gives Kentaro a call.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: A figure from Kentaro's past comes back into his life, causing friction with Aki. She then finds out about a great job opportunity — in Singapore.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Aki makes a decision about the job in Singapore. Kentaro holds a press conference to apologize for the scandal caused by his father.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Kentaro goes into labor and is rushed to the hospital. Kentaro's parents and Aki wait together for the baby to be delivered.
